title: Vx
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegan variety store & fast food coffee cafe. It's part of the Vegan Cross chain. Selling a set menu including kebabs, burgers and nachos, as well as coffee and cake. Some places to sit insid. Sells a variety of vegan foodstuff as well shoes, pet snacks, books, and clothing. Has SSOV produced t-shirts, hoodies, bags, and accessories. Opened here Dec 2015 and is the 2nd shop to the one in London.
